short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make and receive calls using your SIPcity numbers, and click to dial phone numbers from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing SIPcity Keypad, a handy extension for SIPcity users that takes your communication experience to the next level, all within your browser. This nifty tool is your new best mate for making and receiving calls seamlessly, without ever needing to leave your favourite websites.

Click to Dial
Ever come across a phone number on a webpage and waste time copying and pasting it? Not anymore! SIPcity Keypad makes it a breezeâ€”simply click the number and you're connected. It's a great way to save time and boost your productivity.

Feature-Packed for Your Needs
Whether you need to transfer calls to a colleague, merge calls for a quick chat with a team member, or set up a conference with multiple participants, SIPcity Keypad has you covered. You can also put calls on hold, manage several calls at once, and even check if the call is being recorded for future reference.

Getting Started is Easy
To unlock the world of seamless calling directly from your browser, all you need is a SIPcity account with an active plan. Once you're logged in, your numbers will be readily available. Not a SIPcity user yet? Sign up for SIPcity today and experience the future of communication!
